locations.name: Aspen Highlands
locations.description: Aspen Highlands is a breathtaking mountain destination known for its challenging ski slopes and stunning alpine scenery. Offering deep powder runs, scenic vistas, and a laid-back atmosphere, it is a favorite among experienced skiers and nature lovers. The Highlands Bowl provides an exhilarating experience, rewarding adventurers with unparalleled panoramic views. During summer, visitors enjoy hiking, mountain biking, and peaceful nature walks through the majestic Colorado wilderness.

locations.name: Beaver Creek
locations.description: Beaver Creek is a world-class ski resort known for its luxurious charm and family-friendly atmosphere. With impeccably groomed slopes, upscale accommodations, and a welcoming village, it provides a premium winter getaway. Skiers of all levels enjoy its diverse terrain, while summer visitors explore scenic hiking trails. Renowned for its warm chocolate chip cookies at the base, Beaver Creek offers an unforgettable blend of adventure and relaxation.
